title: Ep 332 –Much More Pain Ahead for China with Andrew Horowitz
itunes:title: Much More Pain Ahead for China with Andrew Horowitz
description:
This week, Andrew Horowitz, Host of The Disciplined Investor, is just back from a trip to the real China and tells Frank that he sees real trouble ahead.
It’s impossible to predict where China’s headed because you can’t believe any of the news they release but Andrew says what he saw points towards trouble ahead.
Ghost town after ghost town…
You'll hear him explain to our listeners why investors should be cautious over the next few months as its getting harder and harder to find any stocks to recommend.
Plus, don't miss out on this... Andrew shares a few stocks that he is buying right now!
Enjoy!
Regards,
 
Listen to the latest show by subscribing to iTunes .
